sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: Deployments can be used for declarative updates of Pods and ReplicaSets. The desired state is described in a Deployment object and the Deployment controller then changes the state in a controlled rate.

sect1.title: Creating a Deployment
sect1.para: The following example illustrates a basic Deployment:
sect1.screen: apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: nginx-deployment labels: app: nginx spec: replicas: 3 selector: matchLabels: app: nginx template: metadata: labels: app: nginx spec: containers: - name: nginx image: nginx:1.7.9 ports: - containerPort: 80
sect1.para: To create a Deployment from a YAML file, use kubectl create -f FILE_NAME.
To delete a Deployment, use kubectl delete DEPLOYMENT_NAME.
